name: Look at me!
description:
Look at me! is a puzle based cooperative game where you have to trust your partner to complete the levels.

___________________________________________________________________________________

Ignacio Aguirre García: Game Design, Programmer

Fernando Ramos Madrid: Level Design, Programmer

Ignacio Solís Campos: Lead Artist, Game Design and Programmer

____________________________________________________________________________________

Creative Statement: we use the vision limits to increase the communication between the two players.
